mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.*, DATE_FORMAT (FROM_UNIXTIME(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(b.date_end) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.date_start)), '%i:%S') AS "talk_duration" FROM (SELECT record_date AS "date_start", call_id FROM t_event WHERE record_event_id LIKE "event_pick_up") a INNER JOIN (SELECT caller, receiver, record_date AS "date_end", call_id FROM t_event INNER JOIN t_call USING(record_id) WHERE record_event_id LIKE "event_hang_up" AND t_call.caller = #{caller}) b on a.call_id=b.call_id

SELECT call_id, COUNT(call_id) AS "event_count" FROM t_call JOIN t_event USING (record_id) JOIN t_event_type ON t_event.record_event_id=t_event_type.event_id WHERE t_call.caller = #{caller} GROUP BY call_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_EVENT(record_event_id, record_date, call_id) VALUES(#{recordEventId}, #{recordDate}, #{callId})
